product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil Stuff Sack
long_description: Still haven't found a backpacking stuff sack that is ultra-lightweight and water resistant? Look no further than the Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil stuff sack. Top closure cinches shut with small cord and cord lock; pull handle on bottom aids in unpacking. Silicon impregnated Cordura(R) nylon is weatherproof, lightweight and durable for hiking and backpacking in wet conditions. Seams are double-stitched for added strength. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Still haven't found a backpacking stuff sack that is ultra-lightweight and water resistant? Look no further than the Sea to Summit Ultra-Sil stuff sack.
